scene.EnableIsometricModeNote: Enable Isometric Mode for this scene.
scene.EnableAttachedTilesOcclusionNote: Linked tiles will occlude tokens automatically.
scene.EnableTileFogGhostingNote: Enable tile ghosting for this scene, tiles seen by player will remain visible in revealed fog of war.
scene.BackgroundImageProjectionNote: The module uses the true isometric perspective natively, you can choose another projection which will be transformed to isometric

token.DisableIsometricTokenNote: Disables token isometric rotation and height change
token.EnableTokenOccluderOutlineNote: Disable this to hide the outline.
token.TokenOccluderOutlineColorNote: Choose an outline color for the occluded token.
token.EnableTokenOccluderFillNote: Disabling this will cause the token to be transparent on occluded parts expect the occluded outline.
token.TokenOccluderFillColorNote: Choose an fill color for the occluded token.

tile.AttachTileToWallNote: Attaches a tile to a wall, turning the tile into a smart tile, that hides when a token is behind it, or it's not in view
tile.AttachTileToDoorNote:
Attaches a smart tile to a door, that hides when a door is open
needs to be attached to at least 1 wall
tile.AttachTileToTileNote: Attaches the tile to another tile, so any effect on this tile will effect the other tiles (grouping)
tile.AboveAlphaNote: Set the tile's alpha when the token is above it, defaults to invisible
tile.EnableTileOccluderNote: Set the tile to occlude tokens when they are above it's center
